thread.title: New Zealand Black Power gang captured in striking pictures
thread.title_full: New Zealand Black Power gang captured in striking pictures

title: New Zealand Black Power gang captured in striking pictures
text: The not-so-nice side of New Zealand: Notorious Maori 'Black Power' gang is captured in striking portraits showing off their intricate full-face tattoos Sydney photographer Casey Morton has opened a window into the Black Power gang in New Zealand He has relatives in the notorious gang who allowed him to earn their trust and arrange the photo shoot Morton said he wanted to 'show them for who they really are and let people make up their own mind' Made up primarily by Maori and Polynesian men, Black Power was originally founded in the 1970s The nation-wide gang is known for their bloody and decades-long rivalry with the Mongrel Mob Published: 10:56 GMT, 21 February 2017 | Updated: 14:18 GMT, 21 February 2017 111 shares
